Description:
Participation in hardware/software rollout.
Carry out in-depth technical research for the designated tasks and create detailed recommendation reports.
Prepare accurate paperwork and facilitate the in-house team in carrying out technical evaluations.
Facilitating the proper installment of hardware upgrades and associated activities.Skills
Skills:
Skilled at installing and troubleshooting desktop PC operating systems , network client software.
Skilled in fixing issues pertaining to smartphone applications and software.
Adept in fault-finding and offering solutions to mobile software on iOS, Windows, and Android platforms.
Proven track record of fixing bugs and errors on various smartphone operating systems.
